name: Coding Staff (Out of Business)
description:
A web and software development team creating visually appealing, functional, reliable and easy-to-use applications. We specialize in: - DotNetNuke CMS Development - .NET Development - Python development - eCommerce solutions (CS-Cart CMS) - PHP development - iOS, Android and Windows Phone 7 applications - Design - SEO
Our mission is to build cutting edge products that challenge our developers to push the limits of technology and launch our client’s products to the head of their industry. In our development process we’ve been using an iterative approach combined with some agile methods. Our team consists of more than 30 highly trained designers, technicians, programmers, marketing experts and project managers. We always follow new trends and technologies. The company’s main principles are high quality of services, terms adherence and well-established communication
